actionCalls.description: Logs flow error for all of the Get and CRUD elements in the flow.

actionCalls.label: Log Flow Error

decisions.name: Does_User_of_Error_Perm_Assigned
decisions.label: Does User of Error Perm Assigned?

Flow.description:
This screen flow will allow the user to update when the Patient was verified on a call (task) and will automatically update the appropriate fields on the task.
1.11.0 Bug fix for CCCM-32494 - Remove get VA Identity and its fields- Place of Birth - City, Place of Birth State, Mother's Maiden Name. Replace them with Person Account fields (from Contact). Updated formulas so the Person Account fields would display on the screen. - David Ivey
1.11.0 Bug fix for CCCM-33132 - I redistributed the Patient Verification fields across a 3 row x 4 column matrix so that the "Confirm" button would be accessible without scrolling.
1.15.0 CCCM-35070 (Adding Preferred Name and Pronoun) 7-30-2024: Changed "Pronouns" to "Pronoun"
1.20.0 CCCM-43198 (RN User not Able to See Mother's Maiden Name on Person Accounts) - fixed formMaidenName to point to field on retrieved personaccount, instead of pointing to varMaidenName, which is no longer used.

formulas.description: Adds a line break if branch of service is null
formulas.name: formBranchOfService

formulas.description: Insert's line break if patient's DOB is blank.
formulas.name: formDOB

formulas.description: Adds a line break if Mother's maiden name is blank.
formulas.name: formMaidenName

formulas.description: Checks whether next of kin is blank.
formulas.name: formNextOfKin

formulas.description: Checks whether place of birth is blank and returns a line break.
formulas.name: formPlaceOfBirth

formulas.description: Checks whether primary address is blank.
formulas.name: formPrimaryAddress

formulas.description: checks whether service date is blank
formulas.name: formServiceDates

formulas.description: Checks whether service number is blank
formulas.name: formServiceNumber

formulas.description: Checks whether spouse's name is blank
formulas.name: formSpouseName

formulas.description: The name of a task for when verifying a caller, whether 'self', another person or 'null'.
formulas.name: taskName

formulas.description: Displays the Veteran Name in the Caller Name field if the Caller Relation to Veteran is Self
formulas.name: varCaller_Name_If_Self

formulas.description: Was the last created task more than 10 min ago?
formulas.name: varLastTaskCreatedMoreThan10MinAgo

fields.name: Caller_Name
fields.helpText: Provide the caller's name if the caller is not the veteran

validationRule.errorMessage: The caller name specified is too long. Please limit the caller name to 50 characters or less.

fields.name: Relative_Type
fields.fieldText: If Other, describe caller relation to patient
fields.helpText: If other, describe caller relationship to patient.

fields.name: Current_Location
fields.helpText: Enter the caller's current physical location. An address is preferred, but if address is unknown, a description may be entered.

validationRule.errorMessage: ﻿The Current Location text is too long. Please limit to 255 characters or less.

fields.name: Call_Back_Number
fields.helpText: Enter the preferred telephone number where the caller may be reached if the call disconnects.

validationRule.errorMessage: The Call Back Number is too long. Please limit Call Back Number to 40 digits or less.

fields.name: Verify_Caller_Error
fields.fieldText:
Caller Name Error

The caller name specified is too long. Please limit the caller name to 50 characters or less.
